des: "A refreshing Havana-inspired rum drink.  For when you're expecting Hemingway over, or just having a barbeque on a nice summer day."
ins: In a highball glass, stir together the confectioners' sugar and lime juice. Bruise the mint leaves and drop into glass. Fill glass with crushed ice and pour in rum. Pour in carbonated water to fill the glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.
